thread.title: West Carleton Secondary School evacuated due to strange odour
thread.title_full: West Carleton Secondary School evacuated due to strange odour

author: cbc
title: West Carleton Secondary School evacuated due to strange odour
text:
West Carleton Secondary School has been temporarily evacuated as staff investigate an unusual odour.
It happened Monday morning at the school in the small community of Dunrobin in rural west Ottawa, according to the Ottawa-Carleton District School Board.
"Staff are onsite investigating the source of the odour. Once the source of the odour has been confirmed a decision will be made as to whether the school will open today," the school board said in an emailed statement.
Students will be supervised at Earl of March Secondary School in Kanata, about a 20 minute drive away.
An update is expected by 10 a.m.
